article_title: Motorcyclist killed in crash in Denton County
article_text:
Updated by Matt Peterson:

The victim has been identified as John Anderson, 72, of Graham.

Original post:

A motorcyclist was killed Sunday while attempting to pass a vehicle on a highway near Roanoke.

Officers were dispatched to the 2400 block of State Highway 114, near Highway 377, at 3:30 p.m. The initial report stated that the man riding the motorcycle was trying to pass a vehicle on the left while another was coming head-on, said Fort Worth police Corporal Tracey Knight.

The motorcyclist hit the side of the oncoming vehicle and died at the scene, Knight said.

The Denton County Medical Examiner will release the man’s identity once next of kin are notified.

There were no other injuries.
